articles.description: Indian stock market: Asian markets traded lower while the European stock and bond markets declined. The US stock market was shut on Monday.

articles.author: Kairavi Lukka
articles.title: IT stocks advance; Wipro, HCL shine - The Economic Times
articles.description: The NSE IT Index surged 1.9% on Monday, building on Friday's 5.4% jump in the benchmark following December quarter earnings by Infosys and TCS which were not as bleak as investors had expected.
